name: The Escapade on Mount Kazan
description:
The Escapade on Mount Kazan is a 2.5d sidescrolling platformer I'm developing for an intake assignment.

This is still a demo and it will be updated in the near future.

If you would like to help me improve the game be sure to fill in this form.
https://forms.gle/GSGWanoV7V1Ht9S76 

Thanks in advance!
